titles.title: Resolving all disagreements between the House of Representatives and Senate with respect to H.R. 3295.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/10/2002--Introduced. Considers the conference report to accompany H.R.3295 (Help America Vote Act of 2001) to have resolved all disagreements between the two Houses thereon as proposed by the House of Representatives, which acted first on the conference report.
